title: Euro 2024: Jude Bellingham's strange England goal celebration with Trent Alexander-Arnold explained
content: Jude Bellingham has explained the strange goal celebration he shared with England team-mate Trent Alexander-Arnold after scoring the winning goal against Serbia at Euro 2024 on Sunday. The Real Madrid midfielder's 13th-minute goal gave England the lead, and while they were unable to find a second in the face of long periods of Serbia pressure, they did more than enough defensively to prevent the opposition from creating anything in the way of clear-cut chances. title: Com recorde de público na Neo Química, Corinthians e São Paulo empatam
creator: Jogada10
content: O clássico entre Corinthians e São Paulo, válido pela nona rodada do Brasileirão, não deixou a desejar na tarde deste domingo (16). Os mais de 46 mil torcedores presentes na Neo Química Arena, em São Paulo, presenciaram um Majestoso com golaços, confusão e expulsão. O Tricolor paulista teve duas chances de sair vitorioso – uma com Lucas e a outra com o corintiano Cacá. O Alvinegro, por sua vez, buscou o empate nas duas oportunidades e somou ponto importante na luta contra o...

title: عرض جديد من اتحاد جدة لمحمد صلاح
content: كشفت تقارير صحفية عن تفاصيل العرض الجديد من قبل نادي اتحاد جدة السعودي للتعاقد مع النجم المصري محمد صلاح لاعب فريق ليفربول الإنجليزي في الميركاتو الصيفي المقبل. وأكدت التقارير أن نادي الاتحاد يستعد للمحاولة مرة أخرى بشأن التعاقد مع محمد صلاح في الميركاتو الصيفي القادم بعد فشل ضمه في الصيف الماضي. وأوضحت أن مسئولي نادي اتحاد جدة يجهزون عرض بقيمة 175 مليون يورو من أجل إقناع صلاح بالانتقال إليه في الميركاتو الصيفي القادم. وأشارت التقارير إلى أن مسئولو النادي السعودي لن يستسلمون في...

title: Sake ice cream’s soft power: Luxurious treat promotes Japan’s traditional drink
content: Japan’s nihonshu (Japanese rice wine, or sake ) consumption has continually declined since its peak in the 1970s. Tokyo-based business Sakeice is spreading sake awareness locally and abroad with its own innovative method: ice cream. Unlike a typical ice cream shop displaying flavors in a riot of lurid colors, the Sakeice store, next to Tokyo station in Yaesu, sells a range of mostly plain, white ice cream. Sakeice, however, is far from vanilla — it makes Japan’s (and most likely the world’s)...

Tesco takes drastic steps to protect stores at risk from break-ins by installing machines that stop robbers ‘quickly’
creator: Thomas Godfrey
content: TESCO is using smoke-belching “sentries” to combat store break-ins. The supermarket giant has installed the 4ft devices at branches deemed at risk of being raided. It is understood the tech is wheeled out on to the shop floor only while stores are closed. If motion sensors are activated, the machines fill the store with dense fog, making it hard to grab anything. They are also fitted with a CCTV camera. A message on the front of the robosmog machines reads: “Warning: You’re being watched. Smoke...

title: Mass. to experience dangerous heat, humidity most of this week
content: The National Weather Service has issued an excessive heat watch for some areas of Massachusetts, as most of the state is expected to experience dangerous levels of heat and humidity. title: Vu wins playoff in return from back injury, spoiling Thompson's bid for 1st victory in 5 years
content: Playing for the first time since the Ford Championship in late March in Arizona, Vu beat Thompson and third-round leader Grace Kim with a 5-foot birdie putt on the third extra hole — the par-5 fourth at tree-lined Blythefield Country Club. title: Carreta tomba no acesso a rede de supermercados em Vitória da Conquista
creator: Redação
content: Por Redação Uma carreta tombou no acesso ao Assaí Atacadista em Vitória da Conquista, gerando transtornos na tarde de sábado (15). Até a manhã do domingo (16), o veículo continuava no local. De acordo com o Blog do Anderson , parceiro do Bahia Notícias, não houve registro de feridos no acidente. A Polícia Rodoviária Federal esteve presente para registrar a ocorrência e tomar as devidas providências necessárias.

title: Vu wins playoff in return from back injury, spoiling Thompson's bid for 1st victory in 5 years
content: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. (AP) — Lilia Vu won the Meijer LPGA Classic in a playoff Sunday in her return from a back injury, spoiling Lexi Thompson's bid for her first victory in five years. Playing for the first time since the Ford Championship in late March in Arizona, Vu beat Thompson and third-round leader Grace Kim with a 5-foot birdie putt on the third extra hole — the par-5 fourth at tree-lined Blythefield Country Club. title: Persiste déficit de especialistas en atención psiquiátrica

content: HOUSTON (AP) — Ronel Blanco had the second hitless outing of his brief major league career but was pulled after seven innings as the Houston Astros beat the Detroit Tigers 4-1 on Sunday. Manager Joe Espada shared part of the conversation he had with Blanco when he removed the dominant right-hander from the game. “I just told him how proud I am of what he’s doing,” Espada said. “This is a guy that came out of nowhere and he continues to perform at a high level. content: 【ビュルゲンシュトック共同】ウクライナ提唱の和平案「平和の公式」を話し合う世界平和サミットが16日、スイス中部ビュルゲンシュトックで閉幕した。新興国などからは招待されなかったロシアを和平協議に関与させるべきだとの意見が相次いだ。主催国スイスはロシアを交渉に引き出す策を模索したが、道筋は付かなかった。 全体会合では、サウジアラビアのファイサル外相が「信頼できるプロセスにはロシアの参加が必要だ」と主張し、ケニアのルト大統領は「ロシアがテーブルについていなければならない」と訴えた。チリのボリッチ大統領は「今どんなに難しく見えてもロシアをテーブルに連れてこないといけない」と指摘した。 ドイツのショルツ首相も「ロシアなしでは平和は達成できないのは事実だ」と認めた。サウジやインドなどはサミットの共同声明に支持を表明しなかった。外交筋によると、ロシア不在を理由に支持を見送った国もあったとみられる。...

title: Maduro recibió a alcaldes opositores de Barinas para trazar líneas de acción
creator: Fabiana Dos Reis
content: El presidente de la República, Nicolás Maduro, recibió a alcaldes de oposición del estado Barinas, en el Palacio de Miraflores. Allí estuvieron el alcalde del municipio Ezequiel Zamora, Nelson García Mora, integrante del partido Compromiso País; los alcaldes de Pedraza, José Adrián Azuaje Cordero, y de Obispos, Frenchy Díaz Rodríguez, ambos pertenecientes a las filas de la Mesa de la Unidad Democrática. Por la parte del Gobierno Nacional, asistieron el presidente de la Asamblea...

title: Slovenskí ragbisti získali vo svojej kategórii európske striebro
content: Na turnaji prehrali iba s Cyprom. BAR, BRATISLAVA. Slovenskí reprezentanti v sedmičkovom ragby sú vicemajstrami Conference 2 majstrovstiev Európy. V repríze skupinového zápasu ani vo finále nestačili na svojich premožiteľov z Cypru, keď prehrali 12:19. „Herné vystúpenie nášho tímu bolo na veľmi vysokej úrovni. Bohužiaľ, vo finále sa ukázal rozdiel v drobnej zohranosti a kompaktnosti oboch tímov,“ zhodnotil výkon slovenskej reprezentácie tréner Pavel Lištvan....

title: Gol Tunggal Jude Bellingham Pastikan Inggris Kalahkan Serbia di Laga Euro 2024
content: memastikan mengawali kiprah mereka di dengan kemenangan usai gol tunggalnya membawa the Three Lions menang tipis 1-0 atas Serbia di Gelsenkirchen, Senin (17/6) dini hari WIB. Bellingam tampil gemilang usai gelandang Real Madrid itu menjebol gawang Serbia di menit ke-13. Namun, secara kolektif, Inggris gagal menampilkan permainan apik yang membuat mereka layak diunggulkan untuk meraih gelar untuk kali pertama. Ekspektasi bagi Inggris untuk menjadi juara sangat tinggi meski mereka hanya berhasil...

title: यूपी बोर्ड: कॉलेजों में पहुंचने लगीं हाईस्कूल और इंटर की मार्कशीट
content: अमरोहा। बीस अप्रैल को यूपी बोर्ड के परिणाम की घोषणा के साथ ही हाईस्कूल एवं इंटर के परीक्षार्थी बेसब्री से अंक प्रमाणपत्र (मार्कशीट) का इंतजार कर रहे थे। लेकिन अब जल्द ही उनका यह इंतजार खत्म होने वाला है। बोर्ड द्वारा मार्कशीट डीआईओएस कार्यालय में पहुंचा दी गईं हैं। जिनको संबंधित कॉलेजों का पहुंचाने काम किया जा रहा है। जिसके बाद मार्कशीट छात्र-छात्राओं को वितरित कर दी जाएंगी। यूपी बोर्ड की हाईस्कूल एवं इंटर की परीक्षा में अमरोहा के परीक्षार्थियों द्वारा शानदार प्रदर्शन किया गया था। हाईस्कूल की...
